read_heavy.expr: self.output['read_heavy']['val'] = sum([self.input[var]['val']*weight for (var, weight, self) in zip(variables, weights, [self]*len(variables))])

write_heavy.expr: self.output['write_heavy']['val'] = sum([self.input[var]['val']*weight for (var, weight, self) in zip(variables, weights, [self]*len(variables))])
